__comment.{: only not at the start of word
__comment.}: only not at the end of word
__comment.!: only not after the following character(s)
__comment.*: only not before the following character(s)
__comment.&: only after the following phonetic value(s)
__comment.%: only not after the following phonetic value(s)
__comment.$: becomes the following char if at the end of a word
__comment.|: only at the start of end of word
__comment.scripts_1: arabic, latin, greek, cyrillic, insular, armenian, runic, asomtavruli, nuskhuri, mkhedruli,
__comment.scripts_2: mtavruli, hebrew, canadian-syllabics, shavian, coptic, phoenician, aramaic, syriac, parthian,
__comment.scripts_3: south-arabian, ge'ez, brahmi, devangari, mongolian, glagolitic, ogham, black-letter, syriac,
